name: JOTTECT
description:
This is an adventure game related to a science fiction "Journey to the Center of the earth".

PLEASE READ CAREFULLY.

👉About the book:

    This is science fiction about three characters (uncle Lidenbrock, Axel, and Hans) who set off on an adventure to the center of the earth. It mainly focuses on how exciting the adventure is and what difficulties they faced. Could they reach the center of the earth? Play the game and figure it out!

👉 introduction

 This is an adventure game to the center of the earth. You will need to answer some questions about the book during your adventure.

👉 Instructions

1.Start the game

2. You will see three buttons

📢 Remember to click "introduction" 

📢 Some answers can be found in the "introduction" 

3. Press " start" to begin your adventure

4. Last, when you finished your adventure. You can exit or replay

5. Enjoy and have fun!
